text: Notes - This page has been copied 1 to 1 from FFH Voice with the last page list updated to only those that automatically send an SMS. There is no scripting in FR side yet. (July 13)

transitionRoutes.condition: "Change Bill Address / Change Bill Address attempt two / Report a Payment / RaP attempt two / Data TU or FP attempt two / Change Bill Address attempt two /Change PIN attempt two / Everything Roaming / Add Easy Roam / Enable or disable data / Fast Pass / Data top up or Fast pass / Activate SIM / Bill notifications or eBill / Payment Arrangement / Forgot PIN / Change PIN / Reset password / Call control / Make a payment / Change billing address / Payments arrangement online or app / Activate Sim online or app / Enable or disable data online or app / Add easy roam online or app" : $session.params.last_page AND $session.params.targetAccount.isSelfserveMandatory = "true" AND $session.params.mandatory_confirm_sms = "1"

text: Okay, I will get you to a team member to help. Please know that our team members don't have access to complete the change for you, but they can guide you through the process online.
Do you still want to wait on hold?

transitionRoutes.name: 850a74fd-842e-4b65-a76c-e45cc7822fef

transitionRoutes.condition: "Change Bill Address / Change Bill Address attempt two / Report a Payment / RaP attempt two / Data TU or FP attempt two / Change Bill Address attempt two / Change PIN attempt two / Everything Roaming / Add Easy Roam / Enable or disable data / Fast Pass / Data top up or Fast pass / Activate SIM / Bill notifications or eBill / Payment Arrangement / Forgot PIN / Change PIN / Reset password / Call control / Make a payment / Change billing address / Payments arrangement online or app / Activate Sim online or app / Enable or disable data online or app / Add easy roam online or app" : $session.params.last_page AND $session.params.targetAccount.isSelfserveMandatory = "false" AND $session.params.mandatory_confirm_sms = "3"
transitionRoutes.name: 93afae7a-720e-4a02-bd8e-b301bac22b9e

transitionRoutes.condition: "Change Bill Address / Change Bill Address attempt two / Report a Payment / RaP attempt two / Data TU or FP attempt two / Change Bill Address attempt two / Change PIN attempt two / Everything Roaming / Add Easy Roam / Enable or disable data / Fast Pass / Data top up or Fast pass / Activate SIM / Bill notifications or eBill / Payment Arrangement / Forgot PIN / Change PIN / Reset password / Call control / Make a payment / Change billing address / Payments arrangement online or app / Activate Sim online or app / Enable or disable data online or app / Add easy roam online or app" : $session.params.last_page AND $session.params.targetAccount.isSelfserveMandatory = "true" AND $session.params.mandatory_confirm_sms = null

text: <speak><s>The transaction you're calling about is only available online. I have sent the text too, <prosody rate=".90"> <say-as interpret-as='telephone' google:style='zero-as-zero'> $session.params.sms_phone_number</say-as>.</prosody></s></speak>

transitionRoutes.name: e4ebeb4e-c477-4cb8-9689-7ccc5dabe8fd

transitionRoutes.condition: "Change Bill Address / Change Bill Address attempt two / Report a Payment / RaP attempt two / Data TU or FP attempt two / Change Bill Address attempt two / Change PIN attempt two / Everything Roaming / Add Easy Roam / Enable or disable data / Fast Pass / Data top up or Fast pass / Activate SIM / Bill notifications or eBill / Payment Arrangement / Forgot PIN / Change PIN / Reset password / Call control / Make a payment / Change billing address / Payments arrangement online or app / Activate Sim online or app / Enable or disable data online or app / Add easy roam online or app" : $session.params.last_page AND $session.params.targetAccount.isSelfserveMandatory = "true" AND $session.params.mandatory_confirm_sms = "2"

text: Okay, I will get you to a team member to help. Please know that our team members don't have access to complete the change for you, but they can guide you through the process online.
Do you still want to wait on hold?

transitionRoutes.name: 2c777217-4cb6-489b-b945-63100d58381a

transitionRoutes.condition: "Change Bill Address / Change Bill Address attempt two / Report a Payment / RaP attempt two / Data TU or FP attempt two / Change Bill Address attempt two / Change PIN attempt two / Everything Roaming / Add Easy Roam / Enable or disable data / Fast Pass / Data top up or Fast pass / Activate SIM / Bill notifications or eBill / Payment Arrangement / Forgot PIN / Change PIN / Reset password / Call control / Make a payment / Change billing address / Payments arrangement online or app / Activate Sim online or app / Enable or disable data online or app / Add easy roam online or app" : $session.params.last_page AND $session.params.targetAccount.isSelfserveMandatory = "false" AND $session.params.mandatory_confirm_sms = null

text: <speak><s>The transaction you're calling about is also available online. I have sent you a text message with information on how to do this online to <prosody rate=".90"> <say-as interpret-as='telephone' google:style='zero-as-zero'> $session.params.sms_phone_number</say-as>.</prosody></s></speak>
Do you still want to wait on hold?

transitionRoutes.name: f7e6dd42-e5d7-4310-be55-0e481693cb07
